content: Good afternoon, Mr. Smith. Thank you for taking the time to visit my apartment in Mannheim. As the landlord, I am looking to rent out the property for the highest possible price. Could you please provide me with your offer for the rental price?

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mr. Smith. The apartment is 25 square meters and is located in a prime location in Mannheim.
